page.title: 03LIFESTYLES A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: 6.00am Iwake upand go to the bathroom then I read for about half an hour. 7.00am I get dressed and pack my bag. Then I go downstairs to have breakfast After that I watch about 10 mins of Breakfast Television. 7.30am I go back in the bathroom to clean my teeth.Then I go into my bedroom to read. 8.20am I put my coat and shoes on and leave for school at Chester Avenue. 8.30 I reach school and play football until 9.00.First we normally have maths,then some English,P.E or games and another English type lesson. 3.30pm I leave school and arrive home. 4.10pm I watch television,read and have tea. 7.30pm I go on my computer and sometimes write my own games. 8.00pm I clean my teeth and go to bed. By Alan Strange from Lyndhurst school.
